boardgames.name: Agricola
boardgames.description: 4x boardgame where you build a house, farm, and economically suffocate your opponents.

achievements.name: Three Little Piggies
achievements.description: Win a game while fully building the house.

boardgames.name: Splendor
boardgames.description: A turned based resource management game where you collect gems to buy more gems - Proving that gems truely are valueless and wealth begets wealth.

achievements.name: Nah, I'm too poor to play.
achievements.description: Win a game a Splendor while only purchasing 5 gem cards.

achievements.name: Schroog Mcducks greatest dream.
achievements.description: Win a game of Splendor while purchasing at least 15 gem cards.

achievements.name: I'm dreaming of Green!
achievements.description: Win a game only purchasing emeralds.

achievements.name: I'm dreaming of Blue!
achievements.description: Win a game only purchasing Sapphires.

achievements.name: I'm dreaming of Black!
achievements.description: Win a game only purchasing onyx.

achievements.name: I'm dreaming of White!
achievements.description: Win a game only purchasing diamonds.

achievements.name: I'm dreaming of Red!
achievements.description: Win a game only purchasing rubies.

achievements.name: I'm NOT dreaming of gold!
achievements.description: Win a game without ever using a gold token.

boardgames.name: Google Dinosaur game
boardgames.description: I KNOW THIS ISN'T A BOARD GAME! IT TRANSENDS ALL THINGS GOOD AND EVIL!

achievements.name: I don't have a problem
achievements.description: Purposefully disconnect your internet so that you can enjoy the sweet sensation that is this game.

achievements.name: Really, it isn't a problem
achievements.description: Sell your home so that you can play the dinosaur game in true HD.

achievements.name: Oops
achievements.description: Actually preform dark magic so that you can summon a meteor to earth to fully live out the true dinosaur experience.

boardgames.name: Thanos Rising
boardgames.description: You are The Avengers. They are you... and your friends. Defeat Thanos and his menions before he completes the ultimate bracelet.

achievements.name: Hero of our time.
achievements.description: Win while not losing any heroes

achievements.name: Not on my watch!
achievements.description: Defeat Thanos and don't let him get any of the infinity stones

achievements.name: I am no Hero...
achievements.description: Defeat Thanos while never collecting a hero aside from your starting one.

achievements.name: The Snap.
achievements.description: Defeat Thanos while he has all the stones stone.
Defeat Thanos without ever activating your hero ability.

boardgames.name: Card's Against Humanity
boardgames.description: A game that replaces humor with cards, sexuality, and profanity. Fun for the whole family.

achievements.name: Well, I didn't vote for you!
achievements.description: Never be the popular vote in an entire game.
